comments:
The WTP Build is about a week old (so roughly 0512)

WebServicesManager caused problem when creating a new EJB Project offline. 

*** ERROR ***: Fri May 19 13:03:45 EDT 2006    java.lang.NullPointerException
        at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.ArtifactEdit.getProject(ArtifactEdit.java:474)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.componentcore.util.WSCDDArtifactEdit.getWebServicesClientXmlResource
URI(WSCDDArtifactEdit.java:128)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.componentcore.util.WSCDDArtifactEdit.getDeploymentDescriptorResource
(WSCDDArtifactEdit.java:122)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.componentcore.util.WSCDDArtifactEdit.getWscddXmiResource(WSCDDArtifa
ctEdit.java:97)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.helper.WebServicesManager.getWorkspace13ServiceRefs(WebServicesManag
er.java:590)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.helper.WebServicesManager.getAllWorkspaceServiceRefs(WebServicesMana
ger.java:580)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.helper.WebServicesManager.notifyListeners(WebServicesManager.java:26
6)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.helper.WebServicesManager.visit(WebServicesManager.java:773)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.ResourceDelta.accept(ResourceDelta.java:67)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.ResourceDelta.accept(ResourceDelta.java:76)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.ResourceDelta.accept(ResourceDelta.java:48)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.helper.WebServicesManager.acceptDelta(WebServicesManager.java:329)
        at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.webservice.helper.WebServicesManager.resourceChanged(WebServicesManager.java:32
0)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager$2.run(NotificationManager.java:280)
        at org.eclipse.core.runtime.SafeRunner.run(SafeRunner.java:37)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.notify(NotificationManager.java:274)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.events.NotificationManager.broadcastChanges(NotificationManager.java:148)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.broadcastPostChange(Workspace.java:256)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.endOperation(Workspace.java:958)
        at org.eclipse.core.internal.resources.Workspace.run(Workspace.java:1746)

        at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)

The code in ArtifactEdit was made null safe by another defect last week.  Also, the code in WSCDDArtifactEdit needed some null checks for the binary case especially where the project could be null.

With these changes, I disconnected from network and was still able to create EJB projects from the J2EE perspective.

This is fixed and released for 052506 1.5 RC4 driver.

This is part of a mass update to close out all stale WTP resolved bugs from the 1.0.x and 1.5.0 timeframe.  If you feel this bug was closed inappropriately, please reopen.

Thanks, John Lanuti
